document_data.name: ''Beruel's Retort''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Beruel's Retort''''' were a pair of [[enchanted]] [[dwarf|dwarven]] [[throwing axe]]s that could as easily be wielded in melee as they were effective at a great range.
document_data.Description: The ''Beruel's Retort'' axes were short-hafted weapons of [[steel]] and [[silver]]. These axes were designed to penetrate thick [[orc]]ish skulls.
document_data.Powers: These thrown axes were silvered and possessed a ''+1 enchantment''.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1368 DR]], these axes were available from [[Taerom Fuiruim]], the smith from the [[Thunderhammer Smithy]] in [[Beregost]].
